name: shell-alias
title: Shell Alias
description: Quickly retrieve your shell aliases, paste and manage them directly from Raycast.
author: clement_cloux

commands.name: alias
commands.title: Show Aliases
commands.subtitle: Shell Alias
commands.description: List and manage your shell aliases

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
